text: Except for records made public according to the regulations promulgated by the Mayor pursuant to § 22-4011(g), no sex offender registration information shall be available as a public record under § 2-532.
historical:

For Law 13-137, see notes following § 22-4001.

DC CODE § 22-4017

Current through December 11, 2012

division.text: Criminal Law and Procedure and Prisoners.
